question: Which country has announced a USD 150 million to invest in training for middle-to-high-skilled occupations?
explanation:
The United States has recently announced a USD 150 million (equivalent to Rs 1,100 crore), to invest in training for middle-to-high-skilled H-1B occupations.
The fund will be used to invest in key sectors in the American economy, including Information technology, cyber security, advanced manufacturing and transportation. The H-1B One Workforce grant would also be used to upskill the workforce.
